Witodlice to ðam ic com.
WSCp MARK 1.39 & he wæs bodigende on heora gesamnungum & ealre Galilea, & deofolseocnessa ut adrifende.
WSCp MARK 1.40 And to him com sum hreofla hine biddende, & gebigedum cneowum him to cwæþ,
Drihten, gif þu wylt ðu miht geclænsian me.
WSCp MARK 1.41 Soðlice se hælend him gemiltsode, & his hand aþenode & hine æthrinende & þus cwæð,
Ic wylle;
Beo ðu geclænsod.
WSCp MARK 1.42 & þa he ðus cwæð sona seo hreofnys him fram gewat,
& he wæs geclænsod.
WSCp MARK 1.43 & sona he bead him. WSCp MARK 1.44 & cwæð,
warna þæt ðu hit nanum men ne secge, ac ga & ætyw ðe þara sacerda ealdre, & bring for ðinre clænsunga þæt Moyses bebead him on gewitnesse.
WSCp MARK 1.45 & he þa utgangende ongan bodian & widmærsian þa spræce, swa þæt he ne mihte openlice on þa ceastre gan, ac beon ute on westum stowum,
& hi æghwanon to him comon.
WSCp MARK 2.1 & eft æfter dagum he eode into Cafarnaum;
& hit wæs gehyred þæt he wæs on huse.
WSCp MARK 2.2 & manega togædere comon,
& he to heom spræc.
WSCp MARK 2.3 & hi comon anne laman to him berende, þone feower men bæron.
WSCp MARK 2.4 & þa hi ne mihton hine inbringan for þære mænigu, hi openodon þone hrof þar se hælend wæs,
& hi þa inasendan þæt bed þe se lama on læg.
WSCp MARK 2.5 Soðlice ða se hælend geseah heora geleafan, he cwæð to þam laman,
Sunu þe synt þine synna forgyfene.
WSCp MARK 2.6 Þar wæron sume of ðam bocerum sittende, & on heora heortum þencende.
WSCp MARK 2.7 Hwi spycð þes þus;
He dysegað;
Hwa mæg synna forgyfan buton God ana?
WSCp MARK 2.8 Ða se hælend þæt on his gaste oncneow þæt hi swa betwux him þohton, he cwæð to him,
hwi ðence ge þas ðing on eowrum heortan?
WSCp MARK 2.9 Hwæðer is eðre to secgenne to þam laman, þe synd ðine synna forgyfene, hwæðer þe cweðan, aris, nim ðin bed & ga?
WSCp MARK 2.10 Þæt ge soðlice witon þæt mannes sunu hæfð anweald on eorðan synna to forgyfanne, He cwæð to þam laman. WSCp MARK 2.11 Þe ic secge
aris, nim þin bed & ga to þinum huse.
WSCp MARK 2.12 & he sona aras, & beforan him eallum eode, Swa þæt ealle wundredon & þus cwædon,
næfre we ær þyllic ne gesawon.
WSCp MARK 2.13 Eft he ut eode to ðære sæ,
& eall seo menigeo him to com
& he hi lærde.
WSCp MARK 2.14 & þa he forð eode he geseah Leuin Alphei sittende æt his cepsetle,
& he cwæð to him,
folga me;
þa aras he & folgode him.
WSCp MARK 2.15 & hit gewearð þa he sæt on his huse þæt manega manfulle sæton mid þam hælende & his leorningcnihtum;
Soðlice manega þa ðe him fyligdon wæron boceras & Farisei, & cwædon,
witodlice he ytt mid manfullum & synfullum;
& hi cwædon to his leorningcnihtum,
hwi ytt eower lareow & drincð mid manfullum & synfullum?
WSCp MARK 2.17 Þa se hælend þis gehyrde he sæde him,
ne beþurfon na ða halan læces, ac ða þe untrume synt;
Ne com ic na þæt ic clypode rihtwise ac synfulle.
WSCp MARK 2.18 & þa wæron Iohannes leorningcnihtas & Pharisei fæstende;
& þa comon hi & sædon him,
Hwi fæstað Iohannes leorningcnihtas & Phariseorum,
& þine ne fæstað?
WSCp MARK 2.19 Ða cwæð se hælend,
cweðe ge
sceolan þæs brydguman cnihtas fæstan swa lange swa se brydguma mid him is;
Ne magon hi fæstan swa lange tide swa hi ðone brydguman mid him habbað?
WSCp MARK 2.20 Soðlice þa dagas cumað þonne se brydguma him bið framacyrred,
& þonne hi fæstað; On þam dagum.
WSCp MARK 2.21 Nan man ne siwaþ niwne scyp to ealdum reafe
elles he afyrð þone niwan scyp of þam ealdan reafe
& biþ mare slite.
WSCp MARK 2.22 & nan man ne deð niwe win on ealde bytta,
elles þæt win tobrycð þa bytta,
& þæt win bið agoten
& þa bytta forwurðaþ;
ac niwe win sceal beon gedon on niwe bytta,
þonne beoð butu gehealden.
WSCp MARK 2.23 Eft wæs geworden þa he restedagum þurh æceras eode, his leorningcnihtas ongunnon þa ear pluccigean.
WSCp MARK 2.24 Þa cwædon Pharisei to him,
loca nu hwæt þine leorningcnihtas doð, þæt him alyfed næs on restedagum?
WSCp MARK 2.25 Þa sæde he him,
ne rædde ge næfre hwæt dyde Dauid þa hine hingrode & þa ðe mid him wæron,
hu he in Godes huse eode, under Abiathar þara sacerda ealdre,
& he æt þa ofrunghlafas, þe him ne alyfede næron to etanne, buton sacerdon anum,
& he sealde þam ðe mid him wæron?
